title: Whose first UK number 1 single was a 1982 cover of a Supremes song? - Quora

response.answer_text: I could sarcastically answer, “Town Called Malice, The Jam” since that entire song rips off its melody from The Supremes. :) But I think you might be referencing the Banarama’s cover of “Really, Saying Something” which was also a motown hit.
